author: tv
msg: Attempt to solve the meta-data caching issues. The current preliminary solution tries to use a schema from the existing schemaCache but does not (yet) create new schema entries. Aliases columns and aliases tables are not cached at all.

author: acumiskey
msg: FIX: The cache-file setting should still be set even if use-cache setting is not provided (as it defaults to true).

msg: o added all the configuration attributes which have default values in the code
